author: danjmartin
title: danjmartin published Keeping up with the Cabinet reshuffle? Latest on the hiring and...
text:
Keeping up with the Cabinet reshuffle? Latest on the hiring and firing in Downing Street By danjmartin | Posted: July 14, 2016 0 COMMENTS SHARES Damian Green - the New DWP boss at Number 10 Keeping up with the Cabinet reshuffle? Latest on the hiring and firing in Downi... X 
Copy link to paste in your message / 
New Prime Minister Theresa May has been reshuffling her cabinet. 
Here is the latest on who has been hired and fired. 
Chancellor of the Exchequer - Phillip Hammond grabs the purse strings from George Osborne 
Home Secretary - Amber Rudd replaces Theresa May 
Foreign Secretary - Boris Johnson zip-wires in for Phillip Hammond 
Education Secretary - Loughborough MP Nicky Morgan expelled and with Justine Greening going to the top of the class 
Brexit minister - David Davis enters before exiting 
Defence Secretary - Michael Fallon remains in command 
Health Secretary - Jeremy Hunt - reports of his death greatly exaggerated 
International Trade - Liam Fox takes over 
Justice Secretary - Liz Truss In, Michael Gove sent into exile. 
Transport Secretary - Chris Grayling - All aboard. 
Secretary of State for Work and Pensions - Damian Green replaces Stephen Crabb who moves out of Government, not sideways. 
Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs - Andrea Leadsom digs in 
Communities and Local Government secretary - Sajid Javid takes over 
Chief Whip - Gavin Williamson cracking on
